message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price of $18000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.

Thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $12000.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $14000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $13000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while still respecting my budget.
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $13500. This is the best I can do, so I hope you can understand my position.

Alice, thank you for your flexibility. I appreciate your effort in adjusting your offer. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $13000. I hope this proposal helps us reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

I've already offered you $13500, and you're still asking for $13000. I'm not willing to go any lower than $13500. This is my final offer, so please let me know if you're willing to meet me at this price.
Alice, I respect your final offer of $13500. However, considering my financial constraints, I am unable to accept this offer. I will now look into purchasing the product from John for $10000.
